column4: Question:  If linux is on an ext3 partition, and I have all my media on a secondary HDD which is NTFS, can I still use samba to share the folders on that drive?
MasterShrek....I read that Ext3 does not like sharing with NTFS, and I would need to formatr that media hard drive to Fat32 to share folders?
akaik you can read from NTFS, but not write, with fat32 you can do both
